UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Fine-Tuning of Alkaline Residues on the Hydrophilic Face Provides a Non-toxic Cationic α-Helical Antimicrobial Peptide Against Antibiotic-Resistant ESKAPE Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Luo X, Ye X, Ding L, Zhu W, Yi P, Zhao Z, Gao H, Shu Z, Li S, Sang M, Wang J, Zhong W, Chen Z

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:12.2% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts L929:17% Cytotoxicity=40 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:0% Cytotoxicity=<40 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=10µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=5-10µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=10µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=10µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=20µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=10µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=20µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=20µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=5µg/ml)
